description: Inside a ring of ancient stone columns, leather-clad Ren Adams works his findgers, fist, and finally his forearem into the deepest recesses of Chuck Barron's waiting ass.  When his fingers have had their fill, Ren nestles Chuck down on an enormous dildo...pressing out a load as he takes the tool.  Then it's Ren's turn as Chuck buries his arm deep in Ren's ass.  From the shadows, Brad Stone is drawn into the action...substituting his own arm for Chuck's.  Finally the two tops take turns...sliding their hands in and out until all are satisfied.
series: The Abduction Series, Part III - Redemption
title: The Abduction Series, Part III - Redemption, Scene #03
